channel.title: Comments on: A Week of SQL Server
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: genomon
item.dc:creator: genomon
item.description: I can only encourage all that are able to attend any of these! I will be at SQL Saturday in Madison this weekend, along with some colleagues from work that I recruited. It's an awesome learning experience, and a great opportunity for peer networking. Ted this year please don't pretend you don't know me. I will be the one with the "Play Free Bird" placards. I'm bringing one for Ted Jr...
item.content:encoded: I can only encourage all that are able to attend any of these! I will be at SQL Saturday in Madison this weekend, along with some colleagues from work that I recruited. It’s an awesome learning experience, and a great opportunity for peer networking. Ted this year please don’t pretend you don’t know me. I will be the one with the “Play Free Bird” placards. I’m bringing one for Ted Jr…
